Table of Contents

NAME

chngolombdecode - Golomb decoding of a binary channel

SYNOPSIS

chngolombdecode bitstream channel

DESCRIPTION

chngolombdecode decodes a bitstream produced by chngolombencode(1) and outputs a channel (CHN format).

chnagolombdecode calls QccENTGolombDecodeChannel(3) to do the actual Golomb decoding.

NOTES

Golomb coding originated in the 1966 paper by Golomb, which is classic, short, and beautifully written with a sense of humour.

SEE ALSO

chngolombencode(1) , QccENTGolombEncodeChannel(3) , QccENTGolombDecodeChannel(3) , chnentropy(1) , QccPackENT(3) , QccPack(3)

S. W. Golomb, "Run-Length Encodings," IEEE Transactions on Information Theory, vol. 12, pp. 399-401, July 1966.

AUTHOR

Written by Yufei Yuan <yuanyufei@hotmail.com>
